QuestData.Title: Delvar Ironfist
QuestData.RewardText: Well it's about time ye showed up. I'm done slumming around with these new recruits.$b$bMe blade is sharp, me armor is spit shined and I combed me beard this mornin'.$b$bI've been ready for battle since me grandpa Gygax first put an axe in me wee lil hand.$b$bSo whad'ya say, commander?
